Get Service

requests.description: Get catalog item for the CBP.

requests.description: Associated catalog service to the CBP's catalog item.

requests.tests: tests["Status code is 200. Can reach to Composition service."] = responseCode.code === 200;
requests.name: Get existing blueprints
requests.description: Gets blueprints. It is a sanity check so to make sure that composition service is accessible.

requests.name: Login with infra architect
requests.description: Returns a token associated with the provided credentials. e.g. (username@domain)

requests.name: Create a basic vSphere blueprint
requests.description: Creates a new vSphere clone CBP with a given template name. Also publishes the CBP.
